DOC.brief_summary: KISSING DEBBIE's aim at assessing angiographic and clinical outcomes of provisional treatment of coronary bifurca6on lesions according to TAP sten6ng with BMS and final kissing DEB
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study of Kissing Drug‐Eluting Balloons in Coronary Bifurcation Lesions
DOC.criteria: Age >18 years De novo major bifurca6on lesion of the left coronary artery (LAD‐D; LCXOM) RVD 2.25‐4.0 mm LMCA AMI within 48 hours Limited compliance with 3month dual antiplatelet therapy
